subject: World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Johnny Damon’s ninth inning — a single to cap off a nine-pitch at-bat and steals of second and third on one play — could have a lasting place in Yankees lore.
snippet: Johnny Damon’s ninth inning — a single to cap off a nine-pitch at-bat and steals of second and third on one play — could have a lasting place in Yankees lore.
